anime.NO_DATA:
\❌ **%AUTHOR%**, No results were found for **%QUERY%**.
If you believe this anime exists, try the following methods:

 • Try the alternative names (e.g. English, Native, Romanized)
 • Include the season number (if applicable)
 • Include the type (e.g. OVA, ONA, TV Shorts).
anime.TIMEOUT:
\❌ **%AUTHOR%**, **MyAnimeList** took longer to respond.

Please try again later, this may be caused by a server downtime.
anime.NONNSFW:
\❌ **%AUTHOR%**, you've searched for `Hentai` on a sfw channel!

Your query, **%QUERY%**, returned a hentai title from **%ANIME_STUDIO%**. Please try to query hentai entries on nsfw channels%NSFW_CHANNELS%. While you're at it, you can query these on **Hanime** instead using `hanime` command aswell.

setlang.INVALID_CODE:
\❌ **%AUTHOR%**, The Language code you entered is invalid/unavailable.
Make sure you only use one of the following codes: `%LANGUAGE_CODES%`
setlang.ALREADY_IN_USE: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, The selected Language code `%LANGUAGE_CODE%` is already in use! Please select another.

system.prefix: **%AUTHOR%**, my prefix is `%CLIENTPREFIX%`, The custom prefix is `%SERVERPREFIX%`.
system.cooldown:
**%AUTHOR%**, You cannot use this command yet.
Please wait ` %TIME% ` before using this command again
